Students

ID SID Name Action
{{ student.id }} {{ student.sid }} {{ student.name }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { StudentService } from '../../services/student.service' @Component({ selector: 'app-students', templateUrl: './students.component.html', styleUrls: ['./students.component.css'] }) export class StudentsComponent { students: any[] = []; constructor(private studentService: StudentService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.studentService.getStudents().subscribe((data: any) => { this.students = data as any[]; }); } deleteStudent(sid: string) { this.studentService.deleteStudent(sid).subscribe(() => { // Remove the deleted student from the list this.students = this.students.filter(student => student.sid !== sid); }); } }
